mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, BIRTHDAY, PHONE, ADDRESS, EMAIL, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATUS FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, BIRTHDAY, ADDRESS, EMAIL, ENROLL_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBERNO.NEXTVAL, #{ memberId }, #{ memberPwd }, #{ memberName }, #{ birthDay }, #{ phone }, #{ address }, #{ email }, SYSDATE, NULL, DEFAULT )
INSERT INTO TB_AUTHCODE ( DATE, EMAIL, REMOTEADDR, CODE ) VALUES ( SYSDATE, #{ email }, #{ remoteAddr }, #{ code } )
mapper.select: SELECT DATE, EMAIL, REMOTEADDR, CODE FROM TB_AUTHCODE WHERE REMOTEADDR = #{ remoteAddr } AND CODE = #{ code }
